people.name: Prof. Christina Garman
people.expertise: Expert in privacy, applied cryptography, and hardware. Co-Founder of Zcash, the first privacy-preserving cryptocurrency and large-scale deployment of zero-knowledge proofs.

people.name: Prof. Daniel Genkin
people.expertise: Expert in hardware security, trusted execution environments, and side-channel attacks. Co-discoverer of Spectre and Meltdown.

people.name: Dr. Jordan Frery
people.expertise: Leads the ML team at Zama, driving confidential-AI pipelines that keep data and models private using cutting-edge methods like homomorphic encryption. PhD in Machine Learning.
